intro: Psychotria panamensis var. magna, commonly known as the giant psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of Central America, particularly Panama and Costa Rica. This plant is characterized by its large, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in lowland rainforests. The plant is notable for its ornamental value and has been studied for its potential medicinal properties.
